metadata.name: Silence.EDA Detection
metadata.comment: Detects Silence EmpireDNSAgent as described in the Group-IP report

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('system.diagnostics.process')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('stop-computer')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('restart-computer')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('exception in execution')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('$cmdargs')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('close-dnscat2tunnel')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set type=$lookuptype`nserver')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('$command | nslookup 2>&1 | out-string')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-randomdnsfield')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[convert]::tostring($synoptions, 16)')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('$session.dead = $true')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('$session["driver"] -eq')))

output.summary: Detects Silence EmpireDNSAgent as described in the Group-IP report
